name: MTV videos and shows Online Quiz | Other Music | 15 Questions

questions.text: 'Freak On A Leash' won a Grammy for Best Short Form video; whose video is this?
Which video features N'Sync hanging from strings like puppets?
Which video features Mariah Carey with 98 Degrees?
questions.explanation:
Thank God I Found You.

	Joe is also featured in this video.

questions.text: Who was the long-running host of Total Request Live?
questions.explanation:
Carson Daly.

	Daly hosted the wildy popular TRL, which counted down the day's most requested videos.

questions.text: Name the video that features Jennifer Lopez and friends watching a clock countdown to the new millenium ?
questions.correct: Waiting For Tonight & waiting for tonight
questions.explanation:
Waiting For Tonight & waiting for tonight.

	this was the follow-up to If You Had My Love

questions.text: Which two rock groups' names were always on Beavis and Butthead's t-shirts?
questions.explanation:
ACDC and Metallica.

	"Beavis and Butthead Do America" was this dumb duo's feature film.

questions.text: Name this MTV show--seven strangers forced to live together...?
questions.explanation:
The Real World.

	The tagline: "What happens when the cameras never stop rolling and people stop being polite?"

questions.text: What boy band had a hit video entitled 'I Want It That Way' ?
questions.explanation:
Backstreet Boys & backstreet boys.

	Another in a long line of hits for this group.

questions.text: Which artist had the first video ever played on MTV ?
questions.explanation:
The Buggles.

	'Video Killed The Radio Star'--ironic title. Huh?

questions.text: The MTV Video Vanguard Award was once named after which artist?
questions.explanation:
Michael Jackson.

	Michael received the very first Vanguard award given for lifetime achievement in music videos.

questions.text: Which country singer had a MTV hit with 'Still The One'?
questions.explanation:
Shania Twain.

	Shania crossed all musical boundaries with this popular tune.

questions.text: Which Michael Jackson video featured cameos by Eddie Murphy and supermodel Iman?
questions.explanation:
Remember The Time.

	Eddie and Iman played a royal couple that Jackson performed for.

questions.text: Which video featured Madonna dancing in front of burning crosses?
questions.explanation:
Like A Prayer.

	Another controversial move for the First Lady of MTV.

questions.text: What now-famous TV star danced on stage with Bruce Springsteen in 'Dancing In the Dark'?
questions.explanation:
Courtney Cox Arquette.

	Ye,p that was Courtney in The Boss' early 80s video.

questions.text: What title was in the name of early 80s Vee Jay Julie Brown?
questions.explanation:
Downtown.

	Downtown Julie Brown 'Wabba Wabba Wabba'.
